trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_SEQ_00<tab>Uto would like to attract more custom.

TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_TODO_00<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “smoked fish from Isari” at the designated locations to get the locals' attention.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_UTO_000_000<tab>Would you mind helping out a trader who is down on her luck?
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_UTO_000_001<tab>I simply need you to promote my wares to the locals. Try your best to bring the subject up as naturally as possible.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_UTO_000_002<tab>I would specifically like you to mention the smoked fish I have for sale. I caught them back in Isari.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “smoked fish from Isari” to get the locals' attention.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_UTO_000_004<tab>I would specifically like you to mention the smoked fish I have for sale. I caught them back in Isari.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_SYSTEM_000_005<tab>With the chat mode in <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Say<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>, enter “smoked fish from Isari” to get the locals' attention.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_GUESTA02757_000_010<tab>(-Xaela Hunter-)Caught in Isari, you say? I might go and take a look later.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_GUESTB02757_000_011<tab>(-Xaela Shepherd-)Have you ever had smoked fish from Isari before? I hear they're quite delectable.

TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_GUESTC02757_000_012<tab>(-Xaela Shepherd-)I've only had them the once, but I will never forget it. One of the tastiest meals I've ever had for sure. If someone's selling it in Reunion then I'll be first in line to buy some.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_UTO_000_020<tab>Hello again! I am pleased to say I have had a few customers stop by since you went off to spread word of my fish.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_UTO_000_021<tab>If business continues to be this good then I might have enough to buy some fur before heading home. The ocean breeze makes Isari a rather chilly place to live.
TEXT_STMBDZ506_02757_UTO_000_022<tab>Oh, I cannot wait to go back and see my husband again. Thank you for all your help.
